[[module CSS]]
#page-content hr {
border-top: none;
height: .05em;
background: #454545;
}

#page-content > .collapsible-block {
    display: block;
    text-align: center;
    padding: .8em;
    background-color: #e3e3e3;
    border-top: 0.125rem dashed #b5b5b5;
    border-bottom: 0.125rem dashed #b5b5b5;
}

#page-content > .collapsible-block .collapsible-block-content {
    text-align: left;
}

.interview{
    border:solid 2px #d4d4d4;
    background:#F5F5F5;
    width:90%;
    padding:1px 15px;
    margin: 10px auto;
}

.file{
    border:none;
    background:#F5F5F5;
    width:90%;
    padding:1px 15px;
    margin: 10px auto;
}

.addendum{
    border:solid 1px #5e5e5e;
    background:#ffffff;
    width:90%;
    padding:1px 15px;
    margin: 10px auto;
}

.testfile{
    border:solid 3px #643434;
    background:#f7efef;
    width:90%;
    padding:1px 15px;
    margin: 10px auto;
}

.testvideo{
    background:#e9d5d5;
    width:90%;
    padding:1px 15px;
    margin: 10px auto;
}

.message{
    border:solid 3px #ffffff;
    background-image: linear-gradient(129deg, #e6bfbf 25%, #ededed 25%, #ededed 50%, #e6bfbf 50%, #e6bfbf 75%, #ededed 75%, #ededed 100%);
    background-size: 36.03px 44.49px;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 115%;
    padding:1px 15px;
    margin: 10px auto;
}

#page-title{display:none}

[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
.chatwind{
    color:#f9fafb;

    padding:15px 5px;
    margin: 10px auto;
}

.chatbox{
    border-radius: 10px;
    background:#404251;
    width:85%;
    padding:1px 15px;
    margin: 10px auto;
}

.chatbotres{
    border-left: solid 4px #2eeeff;
    background:#50505f;
    width:96%;
    padding:1px 15px;
}

.usres{
    border-left: solid 4px #3d3d4c;
    background:#3d3d4c;
    width:96%;
    padding:1px 15px;
}
